properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 1:21AM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches.
Highest totals above 1000 feet elevation. Winds gusting as high
as 45 mph.

* WHERE...In New York, Eastern Rensselaer County. In
Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. Gusty
winds could bring down tree branches. Blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
